entities.entity_name: bookrag: a hierarchical structure-aware index-based approach for retrieval-augmented generation on complex documents
entities.description: This is the main title of the document, introducing the proposed system 'BookRAG', which is a novel approach for Retrieval-Augmented Generation that leverages hierarchical document structure and indexing for processing complex documents.
The name of the proposed system, a hierarchical structure-aware, index-based model for Retrieval-Augmented Generation.
A methodology that combines information retrieval with text generation, which is the core technique enhanced by the BookRAG approach.
Refers to the target domain or challenge of processing documents with intricate, hierarchical structures, which the BookRAG system is designed to address.

relations.tgt_entity_name: bookrag: a hierarchical structure-aware index-based approach for retrieval-augmented generation on complex documents
relations.description: The model 'BookRAG' is the central subject introduced and described by the main document title.

relations.tgt_entity_name: bookrag: a hierarchical structure-aware index-based approach for retrieval-augmented generation on complex documents
relations.description: The technique 'Retrieval-Augmented Generation' is the foundational methodology that the title's proposed approach is based upon and aims to enhance.
